outcomes.title: Decisive Victory
outcomes.text: The pack's warriors overwhelmed the rival intruders completely. Alpha {wolf.name} led a masterful assault that drove them far from the territory with minimal casualties.

actions.text: The pack achieved a crushing victory! {wolf.name}'s leadership in battle has inspired great confidence.

outcomes.title: Pyrrhic Victory
outcomes.text: The pack drove off the invaders, but at a terrible cost. Alpha {wolf.name} led the charge bravely, but the battle claimed the life of a valued pack member.

actions.text: The territory was defended, but the pack mourns the loss of a brave warrior.

outcomes.title: Costly Defeat
outcomes.text: The battle was a disaster. Alpha {wolf.name} fought valiantly but the pack was outmatched. Wolves were injured and territory was lost to the superior force.

actions.text: The pack suffered a crushing defeat. {wolf.name}'s leadership is now questioned by many.

outcomes.title: Strategic Withdrawal
outcomes.text: Recognizing they were outmatched, Alpha {wolf.name} ordered a strategic retreat. The pack avoided casualties but lost face and some territory.

actions.text: The pack retreated to fight another day, but some question {wolf.name}'s courage.

outcomes.title: Leadership Crisis
outcomes.text: The battle went poorly and Alpha {wolf.name} was severely wounded. A strong pack member sees this as an opportunity to challenge for leadership.

actions.text: {wolf.name} was badly wounded in the failed battle. The pack's confidence is shattered and challengers emerge.

outcomes.title: Triumphant Success
outcomes.text: Alpha {wolf.name} exceeded all expectations in the hunting trial, bringing down a massive elk alone. The pack is awed by this display of skill and leadership.

actions.text: {wolf.name}'s incredible hunting prowess has silenced all doubters! The pack has never been more united.

outcomes.title: Successful Hunt
outcomes.text: Alpha {wolf.name} completed the hunting trial successfully, proving their continued capability as pack leader.

actions.text: {wolf.name} succeeded in the hunting trial and proved their leadership!

outcomes.title: Injured in Trial
outcomes.text: Alpha {wolf.name} attempted the hunting trial but was injured by their prey. Though they survived, their leadership appears diminished.

actions.text: {wolf.name} was injured during the hunting trial. Some pack members whisper about their declining abilities.

outcomes.title: Trial Failure
outcomes.text: Alpha {wolf.name} failed the hunting trial completely, returning empty-pawed and exhausted. The pack's faith in their leadership is severely shaken.

actions.text: {wolf.name} failed the hunting trial miserably. The pack's confidence is shattered and challengers emerge.

outcomes.title: Perfect Ambush
outcomes.text: The night ambush was executed flawlessly. Alpha {wolf.name} led the pack in a silent strike that completely surprised the rival wolves, scattering them without a single casualty.

actions.text: The perfect ambush has become pack legend! {wolf.name}'s tactical brilliance is unquestioned.

outcomes.title: Successful Ambush
outcomes.text: The night ambush succeeded! Alpha {wolf.name} led the pack in a daring strike against the intruders, driving them off with minimal injuries.

actions.text: The night ambush was successful! The pack gained territory and {wolf.name} showed great courage.

outcomes.title: Ambush Discovered
outcomes.text: The rival wolves detected the ambush! Alpha {wolf.name} was forced to lead a chaotic battle in the darkness, resulting in injuries and confusion.

actions.text: The ambush was discovered! {wolf.name} led a chaotic night battle with mixed results.

outcomes.title: Ambush Disaster
outcomes.text: The ambush turned into a complete disaster. Alpha {wolf.name} led the pack into a trap - the rivals were expecting them and counterattacked with devastating effect.

actions.text: The ambush was a trap! {wolf.name} led the pack to disaster - a pack member was killed and many question their judgment.

outcomes.title: Alpha Defends Leadership
outcomes.text: Alpha {wolf.name} met the challenger in ritual combat and emerged victorious despite their weakened state. The pack witnessed true courage and their leadership is stronger than ever.

actions.text: {wolf.name} proved their worth in combat! The pack's faith in their leadership is restored.

outcomes.title: New Alpha Emerges
outcomes.text: The challenger defeated the weakened Alpha {wolf.name} in combat. Leadership of the pack has changed hands in the ancient way, through strength and courage.

actions.text: {wolf.name} was defeated in combat and stepped down as alpha. A new leader has emerged.

outcomes.title: Bloody Stalemate
outcomes.text: The leadership challenge ended with both Alpha {wolf.name} and their challenger badly wounded. The pack intervened to stop the deadly combat, but tensions remain high.

actions.text: The brutal combat was stopped before either wolf died, but {wolf.name}'s leadership crisis continues.

outcomes.title: Pack Division
outcomes.text: The leadership challenge has torn the pack apart. Some wolves follow the challenger, others remain loyal to Alpha {wolf.name}. The pack may never recover from this division.

actions.text: The leadership crisis split the pack! Several wolves left with the challenger, creating a rival pack.

outcomes.title: Alpha Vindicated
outcomes.text: The pack's elders conducted a formal trial of Alpha {wolf.name}'s leadership. After hearing testimony from all pack members, they declared the alpha's leadership sound and just.

actions.text: The pack trial vindicated {wolf.name}! Their leadership is stronger than ever after surviving this challenge.

outcomes.title: Conditional Leadership
outcomes.text: The pack trial resulted in a compromise. Alpha {wolf.name} retains leadership but must prove themselves worthy through future actions. The pack watches closely.

actions.text: {wolf.name} retains leadership conditionally. They must prove their worth in the coming days.

outcomes.title: Peaceful Abdication
outcomes.text: After the pack trial, Alpha {wolf.name} realized their time as leader had passed. They stepped down gracefully, allowing a new wolf to take leadership for the good of the pack.

actions.text: {wolf.name} stepped down as alpha gracefully. The pack respects their wisdom and sacrifice.

outcomes.title: Exile Decision
outcomes.text: The pack trial found Alpha {wolf.name} unfit to lead. By ancient pack law, they were exiled from the territory to prevent further conflict and ensure pack survival.

actions.text: {wolf.name} was exiled by pack trial. Though painful, the pack moves forward under new leadership.

outcomes.title: Leadership Confirmed
outcomes.text: Alpha {wolf.name} has proven themselves during the trial period. The pack unanimously confirms their leadership, stronger and more united than ever before.

actions.text: {wolf.name}'s leadership has been confirmed! The pack's faith is stronger than ever.

outcomes.title: Leadership Maintained
outcomes.text: Alpha {wolf.name} has done enough to maintain their position. While not everyone is completely satisfied, the pack accepts their continued leadership for now.

actions.text: {wolf.name} maintains leadership, though some pack members remain skeptical.

outcomes.title: Renewed Challenge
outcomes.text: Alpha {wolf.name} failed to prove themselves adequately during the trial period. A new challenger steps forward, forcing another leadership crisis.

actions.text: {wolf.name} failed the proving period. A new challenger has emerged to contest their leadership!

outcomes.title: Graceful Resignation
outcomes.text: Recognizing their failure during the proving period, Alpha {wolf.name} chose to step down voluntarily rather than face another challenge. The pack respects their wisdom.

actions.text: {wolf.name} stepped down gracefully after failing the proving period. The pack respects their self-awareness.
